wikitext.*:
'''Mugwort''' was a common family name among the [[Bree-hobbits]].<ref>{{FR|I9}}</ref>

==Etymology==
Mugwort is the name of the plant [[Wikipedia:Artemisia (genus)|Artemisia]] akin to Wormwood. Tolkien mentioned that there is no special reason for the choice of Mugwort, except its hobbit-like sound.<ref name="Nomen">{{HM|N}}, p. 760</ref>
